title: Depression and Gender Classification Analysis
description: Developed machine learning models to classify individuals' depression levels and gender using acoustic features from speech recordings. Achieved high accuracy with XGBoost model, assessing model performance and fairness.

title: Traffic Sign Image Recognition and Classification
description: Implemented CNN (AlexNet) model for traffic sign recognition, achieving 90% precision on a test dataset. Enhanced VR image recognition applications with increased accuracy.

title: Customer Behavior Analysis
description: Led analysis of customer behavior using Random Forest Models, achieving a 20% increase in sales conversion rates. Identified key behavioral patterns with 94% accuracy.

title: Food Delivery Analysis
description: Analyzed delivery time efficiency, identifying biases and providing recommendations for optimizing delivery operations. Assessed factors like location, traffic, and operational biases.

title: Wine Quality Analysis
description: Examined the quality of red and white wines using physicochemical properties. Utilized regression modeling, hypothesis testing, and ANOVA to identify key predictors of wine quality and differences between wine types.

title: Coffee Contains More Caffeine than an Energy Drink
imageSrc: projects/Is Coffee Better than Energy Drinks_.jpg
description: Utilized web scraping and statistical analysis to compare caffeine content in coffee vs. energy drinks. Conducted hypothesis testing to confirm higher caffeine content in coffee.
